thread.title: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour
thread.title_full: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour

title: The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour
text:
Updated: 5:35 p.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 | Posted: 5:35 p.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 The Weeknd, One Direction to perform on Jingle Ball tour Related View Larger FILE - In this Nov. 23, 2014 file photo, Selena Gomez performs on stage at the 42nd annual American Music Awards in Los Angeles. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New York’s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. (Photo by Matt Sayles/Invision/AP, File) View Larger FILE - In this Sept. 22, 2015 file photo, British band One Direction members, from left, Harry Styles, Liam Payne, Niall Horan, and Louis Tomlinson, perform on stage as part of the apple iTunes Festival 2015 in London. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New York’s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File) View Larger FILE - In this June 28, 2015 file photo, The Weeknd performs at the BET Awards in Los Angeles. The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are among the acts slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. IHeartRadio announced Monday, Oct. 5, that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas.The Dec. 11 show at New York’s Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File) Sponsored Links The Associated Press NEW YORK — 
The Weeknd, One Direction and Selena Gomez are slated to perform on the 11-date Jingle Ball tour this December. 
IHeartRadio announced Monday that the tour will kick off Dec. 1 in Dallas with One Direction, Calvin Harris and Demi Lovato, and visit Los Angeles, Philadelphia, Boston, Chicago, New York and Washington, D.C. before concluding on Dec. 19 in Tampa, Florida. 
The lineup of performers varies for each city, though roughly 10 acts will hit the stage at each show. 
Tickets go on sale on Oct. 12. 
The Dec. 11 show at New York's Madison Square Garden will stream on Yahoo! and air as a 90-minute special on the CW Network on Dec. 17. 
Nick Jonas, Ellie Goulding, Hailee Steinfeld and Zedd will also perform on the tour. 
____
